mascot-message: Here you can manage all your content, Create, Delete, or explore it below!

delete-confirmation.message: This will permanently delete {{count}} content item
delete-confirmation.message_plural: This will permanently delete {{count}} content items

approve-confirmation.message: This will approve the selected content items that are in draft or pending status. Only draft and pending items will be approved. This action will make the content publicly available.

delete-confirmation.message: This will permanently delete "{{title}}" and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.

list.no-results: No content found matching your filters.
list.no-results-hint: Try adjusting your filter criteria or create new content.

messages.missing-images: You have {{count}} posts missing image URLs.
